snippet.title: 0 Day Feature Preview
snippet.description:
Get 0 Day Now on Steam! http://store.steampowered.com/app/554920/

Many mechanics have been overhauled with more added. Here's a video with a preview of the new throwing mechanics and ziplines! 0 Day is still in early access so the features in the video will not show the final product. (More enhancements, like to the AI for example, is coming soon!)
